ModMetaData.name: Expanded Woodworking for Vegetable Garden and Minerals and Materials
ModMetaData.author: ItchyFlea | Qwynn
ModMetaData.description: An A16 update of ItchyFlea's Extended Woodworking. Each tree type now produces a unique wood specific to that tree. These new wood types, like the base game metals, can be used to construct various furnitures, buildings, and other items which are designated as 'Woody' in the stuff categories.
